Header: Man dies after being hit by stolen van in Badulla
Content: A man has died after being hit by a van that was stolen at a liquor store in Badulla last night. The deceased was a father of four from Badulupitiya area in Badulla. Police has arrested the 27-year-old man who was stealing the van. The van owner has visited a house after leaving the vehicle with its key on it. Police investigations are underway to arrest another person who was in the van during the incident.
